Interactive UI components

Improve user engagement and enhance the overall user experience by implementing interactive elements such as animations, sliders, and pop-ups using JavaScript libraries like jQuery and React.

Cross-browser compatibility

Provide a consistent experience to all users by testing your website or application on different browsers and using tools like BrowserStack or CrossBrowserTesting to automate the testing process.

Responsive design

Ensure that your website or application looks great on all devices, regardless of screen size, by using CSS media queries or frameworks like Bootstrap and Foundation.
